item.title: Edu dept cracks down on bogus PhD holders in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Raichur: Following allegations that some guest lecturers at govt colleges have secured their appointments using fake PhD degree certificates, the state higher education department has launched a verification drive across colleges in Raichur and neighbouring districts.Some aspirants for guest lecturer posts claimed that similar cases could surface in other parts of the state as well if a thorough investigation is carried out.Officials said the scrutiny was launched after there were complaints...]]>
item.author: Chamaraj Savadi
